com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common

Class MaterialProperty<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.MaterialProperty<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MaterialBooleanProperty

    public abstract class MaterialProperty<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a property for a given material
    If a material container is null, air (0) is used

    It is required to either implement get(int) or get(Material). Not doing so will result in a Runtime exception being thrown upon construction.
